crust.ingredient: Enough water to form a ball

filling.ingredient: 1 large egg or two medium eggs
1/2 cup grated Asiago or Parmesan cheese

crust.direction: Stir together flour and salt. Cut in butter until only fine balls appear.
Cut in oil until evenly distributed.
Pour in water and form dough into ball. Roll out and put into pan. Poke holes in bottom of crust.

filling.direction: Put Collard Greens in food processor until finely chopped (a bit coarser than pesto).
Chop onion and saute until golden brown.
Combine Collard Greens, onion, egg, salt, and half the cheese. Pour into crust.

baking.direction: Bake on 425F for 15 minutes. Turn down to 375F and bake for another 30 minutes.
To check if done: Check if crust is golden brown and poke knife into filling. The knife should come out clean.
